title: “Factors influencing readthrough therapy for frequent cystic fibrosis premature termination codons” Iwona Pranke, Laure Bidou, Natacha Martin, Sandra Blanchet, Aurélie Hatton, Sabrina Karri, David Cornu, Bruno Costes, Benoit Chevalier, Danielle Tondelier, Emmanuelle Girodon, Matthieu Coupet, Aleksander Edelman, Pascale Fanen, Olivier Namy, Isabelle Sermet-Gaudelus and Alexandre Hinzpeter.ERJ Open Res 2018; 4: 00080-2017.
